data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Larrazábal-Filho, Alexandre L., Neres, Patrícia F., Esteves, André M. (2018): The genus Bolbonema Cobb, 1920 (Nematoda: Desmodoridae): emended diagnosis, key to males, and description of three new species from the continental shelf off northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4420 (4): 551-570, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4420.4.6|6 occurrences
